Package net.neoforged.neoforge.client.event

Class ClientPauseChangeEvent

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.bus.api.Event
net.neoforged.neoforge.client.event.ClientPauseChangeEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientPauseChangeEvent.Post, ClientPauseChangeEvent.Pre
public abstract class ClientPauseChangeEvent extends net.neoforged.bus.api.Event
Fired when game pause state is about to change

These events are fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.

  • Method Details

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()

      On Pre it returns what is the upcoming pause state.

      Cancelling will not modify this value.

      On Post it returns the updated pause state

      Returns the pause state.
